response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. This exceptional item has been meticulously designed and crafted to deliver unparalleled performance and satisfaction. Given its unique features and high-quality standards, we believe it's worth more than $12,000. To secure this opportunity, I am offering you the chance to acquire it at an exclusive price of $15,000. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it combines both value and exclusivity. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase.", "product_price": 15000}
